properties.entry: SELECT p.pizzaId, p.pizzaName, s.sizeName, s.price, s.quantity FROM tbl_pizza p JOIN tbl_size s ON p.pizzaId = s.pizzaId

UPDATE tbl_size SET quantity = quantity + ? WHERE pizzaId = ( SELECT pizzaId FROM tbl_pizza WHERE pizzaName = ? )
UPDATE tbl_size SET quantity = quantity - ? WHERE pizzaId = ( SELECT pizzaId FROM tbl_pizza WHERE pizzaName = ? )
